snippet.title: Rad Capstone Demo - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is the first gameplay trailer for our college capstone project: Rad.
Download the game at: https://tinyurl.com/ybvjk2fh 

Rad is a 3D platforming collect-a-thon video game. The game follows Rad, the game’s protagonist, as he collects items around his home town of Vistabell while assisting his friends. The game is developed in Unreal Engine 4.

Rad was also shown at E3 2018 as a finalist in the E3 College Game Competition.

Follow us at our Twitter: https://twitter.com/RadTheGame

Developer websites:
Character Designer - brandthoward.wordpress.com
Environment Arist - http://pchamberlain1994.wixsite.com/pc3d
Programmer - Lloydnguyen3D.com
Sound Designer/ Composer - https://tycobur.bandcamp.com/
